column1: '''The Hobbit Strategy Battle Game''' is a tabletop miniature wargame produced by [[Games Workshop]] and released in December [[2012]].<ref>{{webcite
column4: articlename=Games Workshop: Hobbit Strategy Battle Game Rule Book
column7: accessed=30 January 2013}}</ref> It is primarily based on [[The Hobbit (film series)
column8: ''The Hobbit'' film series]] directed by [[Peter Jackson]].
